person.persName: John C. Riley (Madison County, KY, farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Madison County native. Son of William E. M. Riley and Nancy Riley. Resident in Madison County in 1850. Farm laborer in Madison County in 1860. Mustered into the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private on January 15, 1862. Died of wounds received in battle on March 2, 1863.
